message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this product for $14,000. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is high, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it.

I understand you're looking to negotiate, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to consider a price of $12,500. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $11,000 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting closer, Bob. However, $11,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $12,000, but that's as low as I can go. It's the minimum I need to make a deal worth my while.
